author: Football Italia staff
title: Medics demand 'full screening' after coronavirus
description: Players returning after testing positive for COVID-19 will require extensive testing, as the CONI chief medic warns coronavirus can damage the heart as well as lungs.  	Italy seems to have reached the peak of the pandemic and numbers of new cases, deaths and …
content:
